The Blog As Best As I Remember It

And this is the blog, as best as I can remember it

About

This is not the base Jekyll theme. (Well, it’s based on the base Jekyll theme, but I’ve heavily modified it. You might have noticed that if you’ve seen the base Jekyll theme before.) You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: github.com/jglovier/jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll
